title: Biggest Gains in Social Responsibility in the Management Top 250
sub_head: DexCom, Regency Centers and Maxim Integrated Products head the list
body:
DexCom Inc.’s score for social responsibility increased more than that of any other company in the latest Management Top 250 ranking. Regency Centers Corp . and Maxim Integrated Products Inc. posted the second- and third-biggest gains, respectively, in this category.
The Management Top 250 ranking, developed by the Drucker Institute, measures corporate effectiveness by examining performance in five categories: customer satisfaction, employee engagement and development, innovation, social responsibility and financial strength.
In the 2020 ranking, DexCom’s score for social responsibility rose 10.7 points from 2019, to 49.6. Regency’s score in this category rose 10.2 points, to 62.8, and Maxim’s score rose 9.7 points, to 56.4.
DexCom also had the biggest gain of any company in the Management Top 250 this year in its score for financial strength, and the second-biggest increase in overall score. The company is ranked No. 185 overall. Its highest ranking in any category is in financial strength, where it is No. 33 among the more than 800 companies Drucker studied. It’s No. 428 in social responsibility.
Among the Management Top 250 companies with the 10 biggest gains in social responsibility, Target Corp . is ranked highest for the category, at No. 12.
